synopsis.text: It's time to immerse yourself in the thrilling and unforgiving universe of hardcore wrestling - welcome to CCW! This is no ordinary wrestling; it's a fierce clash of power and strategy, where Yellow and Orange wrestlers put their skills to the ultimate test. From powerful German suplexes to ruthless groin kicks, no move is off-limits in this intense battle for supremacy. The rules are simple: pin your opponent for three seconds and claim victory. But don't be fooled by its simplicity - this high-stakes contest demands every ounce of strength and cunning from its contenders. Prepare for an adrenaline-pumping ride as you witness this unique hardcore wrestling spectacle brought to life through captivating clay animation. CCW, CCW, CCW - let the games begin!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
